Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Oval-shaped jar with a slightly flaring neck and a rounded base made of red clay. The body and a section of the neck are buff coloured, as is a stripe between two black ones. The decoration of horizontal lines is painted in black: two at the base, two on the body and two on the lower section of the jar.
